siteMetadata.title: Unofficial Online COVID-19 Vaccine Scheduling Instructions
siteMetadata.description: Some instructions to help folks schedule their COVID-19 vaccine.

markdownRemark.html:
Scheduling for a COVID-19 vaccine involves the following steps:

  1. Register for a Walgreens.com account
  2. Register for a Walgreens.com pharmacy account
  3. Verify your identity
  4. Answer the COVID-19 screener
  5. Answer other information
  6. Schedule your first dose
  7. Schedule your second dose
  8. Confirm the appointment
  9. Download, print, and complete the Walgreens Vaccine Administration Record Form
